authors.name: Carla Minet
authors.affiliation: Puerto Rico Center for Investigative Journalism (CPI)

title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + Looking for Accountability on the Recovery Efforts in Puerto Rico
description: A panel discussion on the recovery efforts in Puerto Rico after Hurricane Maria, including discussion on the death toll, breakdown in healthcare services, and power restoration.
